ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters/Clerics (off subject of tinkering) Sorry
ygData.msgSnippet: What about Clerics?  Shouldnt they be allowed regular invis.  Especially when they have to see corpse in order to res?
ygData.messageBody:
What about Clerics? Shouldnt they be allowed regular invis. Especially when
they have to see corpse in order to res?

GoodSmritn@... wrote:

> From: GoodSmritn@...
>
> Well , There are certainly alot of issues with this Tinkering problem that we
> gnomes are having and granted we spend alot of money and time doing these
> things...Now I want to lay an Idea or two I have about Enchanters and the
> issues we all face here in Norratth how many time do you wish that you didnt
> die in a zone hostile to you, but a druid or an enchanter could just wander
> in untouched due to thier illusion....makes you stew right?....Well ,I am an
> enchanter tring to get support for request on change on how enchanters can't
> share illusions with others if given permission to it would be a neat way to
> get your corpse or ya thru a dangous area without cring foul to a GM or Guide
> about how your stuck somewhere and wiat 4 hours...just to hear them say i
> can't help you.....here is a letter Written by me to verant....If ya wanna
> help its up to you but only the players can make a difference>>
>
> >>>>Today I witnessed a great fun it was to have the spirit wolf Illusion
> shared by a druid to me. However , that distresses me about the way
> Enchanters are capeable of illusions long before the druids can and there art
> involves illusions so much, but not have a system of sharing any of the
> illusions like the druid. A few friends and I came with a few Ideas to be
> involved with either Everquest as it is now or when you up the level limit.
> The main purpose of this letter is to express on how illusions can be
> benificial to not only the player but the staff at EQ. Here is a few possiple
> examples to introduce to you the ways to incoperate this: (1) Limit it to
> high level enchanters spells only....24th and up...... (2) could make it a
> group only function like the share wolf form with druid............(3) As a
> safeguard so no one is turned into a illusion without permission....make it
> like the ressurect spell posting ,so before you turn into another form so
> people can choose yes or no.... / As for the benifiet of the staff if you
> include the casting of all race illusions you will possibly cut down the
> nagging of players needlessly asking for your guides to get them out of zones
> they should have not been in the first place...and would add some more spice
> to the game.Asit is ya guys looked like you ran out of ideas for illusions
> once you hit the levels of 34th(only 1) , 44th (only 1), and ,49th
> (none)......Before that you had at least 2 per level starting at level
> 4....if enchanters cant at least share a few illusions by level 9th we are
> really should be ashamed since the druid can share wolf form at level 39th
> and enchanters with the art of illusion in our back pocket
> cant......Sincerely Cloverleaf <Fennin Ro Server>
>
>
